docs.snippet: My last letter, sent by the Mohican, Aug. 12, informed you of the departure, effected or intended of all of the squadron except ourselves. The Mohican sailed on the 13th August, and the Relief on the 17th, leaving but ourselves in the harbor. A...

headline.main: FROM THE AFRICAN COAST.; The Cruise of the Saratoga Relative Sailing Qualities of the Saratoga and the Portsmonth. A Trip to Elephant Bay A Run on Shore Peculiarities of the Coast Fernando Po, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: My last letter, sent by the Mohican, Aug. 12, informed you of the departure, effected or intended of all of the squadron except ourselves. The Mohican sailed on the 13th August, and the Relief on the 17th, leaving but ourselves in the harbor. A change has been made in the Relief's route home.

headline.main: AFFAIRS ON THE LOWER POTOMAC; NEWS FROM GEN. HOOKER'S DIVISION AN ACCESSION OF TROOPS THE REBEL BATTERIES PRECARIOUS POSITION OF THE REBEL STEAMER PAGE, ETC.

docs.lead_paragraph: On Sunday last, and during the day yesterday, Gen. HOCKHER'$ Division was materially increased by the addition of the Fifth, Sixth, Seventh, and Eighth New-Jersey regiments of infantry. The Fifth and Seventh came down from Washington in a Government ...

docs.snippet: The steamer S.R. Spaulding arrived here early this morning, from Hatteras Inlet, and brings intelligence of a naval engagement between the United  States gunboats Stors and Stripes, Underwriter, Putnam and Ceres, and two rebel gunboars.

headline.main: NEWS FROM FORTRESS MONROE.; Another Long Range Navel Engagement at Hatteras Inlet Loss of a Schooner with Government Stores Rebel Report of the Evacuation of Tybee Island.

docs.lead_paragraph: The steamer S.R. Spaulding arrived here early this morning, from Hatteras Inlet, and brings intelligence of a naval engagement between the United States gunboats Stors and Stripes, Underwriter, Putnam and Ceres, and two rebel gunboars.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: CIVIL WAR (THE WAR BETWEEN THE STATES)

docs.snippet: On my journey to Hatteras, I have called at "Old Point Comfort," and here I shall spend a few days. During the past day I have moved about to see the "sights," and they are not few. The "contrabands" attract considerable attention.

headline.main: OUR FORT MONROE CORRESPONDENCE.; CONVERSATIONS WITH THE CONTRABANDS THEIR CONTENTED CONDITION PREPARATIONS FOR THE PROSECUTION OF THE WAS, ETC.

docs.lead_paragraph: On my journey to Hatteras, I have called at "Old Point Comfort," and here I shall spend a few days. During the past day I have moved about to see the "sights," and they are not few. The "contrabands" attract considerable attention.
